name: Our Greatest Choices 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Have everyone work together to save the ecosystem of a world in peril! Explore a planet full of problems, get to know its inhabitants and use Objects by transforming them to bring up solutions to every issue you find on the planet!

Platform : Mobile/tablet 
Engine : Unity 
Number of players :1 

Producer : Hugo KOLB
Game Design : Magali BARBIER, Erwan GUELLEC
Game Art : Morgane BELFORT, Dan Cezar COCA, Josselin LARGE
Game Design & Programming : Emeline BERENGUIER, Victor GRENU, Alexis MELEARD
Music & Sound Design : Alexandre BOUADROUNE
